title: Former TCS executive director Phiroz Vandrevala passes away at 70
description: Vandrevala joined the Mumbai-based Tata group firm in 1982 and served as a key part of the leadership team over the decades, including as an ED between 2007-2016. He also was the global head of global corporate affairs at TCS.
content: Phiroz Vandrevala, a former executive director at IT services firm Tata Consultancy Services, passed away on Tuesday at the age of 70 years.Vandrevala, also a former chairman of IT industry body Nasscom, had quit the TCS board in 2016.“We are saddened to share the news of the passing of Mr Phiroz Vandrevala, former director on the board of TCS,” the company said in a post on microblogging website X.
